front.title: Security Automation and Continuous Monitoring (SACM) Architecture

abstract.t: This memo defines a Security Automation and Continuous Monitoring (SACM) architecture. This work is built upon [RFC8600], and is predicated upon information gleaned from SACM Use Cases and Requirements ([RFC7632] and [RFC8248] respectively), and terminology as found in [I-D.ietf-sacm-terminology]. WORKING GROUP: The source for this draft is maintained in GitHub. Suggested changes should be submitted as pull requests at https://github.com/sacmwg/ietf-mandm-sacm-arch/. Instructions are on that page as well.
